meta.notRecommendedFor: Those who use HPCL/IOCL pumps, need airport lounge access, or want premium travel benefits
meta.verdict: A solid entry-level fuel card for BPCL loyalists. The 4.25% value back on BPCL fuel, combined with 5X rewards on everyday categories and a low annual fee of Rs. 499, makes it a cost-effective choice. The fee waiver at Rs. 50,000 annual spend is easily achievable. However, it lacks lounge access and premium benefits. Best paired with a general-purpose rewards card for non-fuel spends.
